pros: Flexible scheduling and preferences taken into consideration. Quick training and hiring process. Timely payments and good compensation, ability to work with other capable carers.
cons: Difficult case managers on occasion - persistent calling to have shifts filled despite well defined availability. Failure to address client behaviour that was unacceptable and insufficient supervision/training.

pros: Co-workers are friendly, I love how they throw meetings every 4 months where there is great food and awesome giveaways. Bonuses are given when criteria is met during reviews every 4 months.
cons: The pay is low, seems to be no room for advancement.
